amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit funding from being used to implement, administer, or enforce the Obama administration's National Ocean Policy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 189 (Roll no. 445).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Byrne amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 189 (Roll no. 445).
